tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: At that very juncture, God arranged to show the Prophet a very great sign—a demonstration, in fact, that Islamic history would not only run its due course, but that certain conditions would also be created to ensure that what it brought to the world would be preserved and thus remain eternally alive
